description.x-y:
The user whips up a storm of diamonds
to damage opposing Pokémon. This may
also raise the user’s Defense stat.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
The user whips up a storm of diamonds
to damage opposing Pokémon. This may
also raise the user’s Defense stat.
description.sun-moon:
The user whips up a storm of diamonds to damage
opposing Pokémon. This may also sharply raise the
user’s Defense stat.

The user whips up a storm of diamonds to damage
opposing Pokémon. This may also sharply raise the
user’s Defense stat.

description.sword-shield:
The user whips up a storm of diamonds to damage
opposing Pokémon. This may also sharply raise the
user’s Defense stat.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise the user's Defense by two stages for each target hit.
effect.shortEffect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise the user's Defense by two stages for each target hit.
